Summary: Small ball object dropped out of sky behind high altitude jet.
divs: Sighting DetailsWas watching a large very high altitude airplane fly over to the north north-west and this silver ball dropped out of the blue sky behind it, followed it for a few seconds then accelerated past it and flew up back into the sky in front of it and was gone. The jet hfad large contrails, the object had none.
trends: There have been 30 other sightings in Longmont
There were no other sightings in Longmont on or around September 25th 2011
